about_the_game:
GAME DESCRIPTION

Welcome to Sentinel Island, a place where the modern world collides with primal forces under the tyrannical rule of Wandal. As a modern man, you must navigate this wild landscape, crafting tools of science to survive against the relentless tribe. Use strategy to outsmart brutal enemies and master immersive mechanics while uncovering dark secrets hidden in the shadows and Bill Black's past.

As you explore the island, confront the remnants of your past and grapple with the question of what 'true civilization' really means. THE SENTINEL is a first-person survival horror and immersive sim game that brings the character Bill Black to life. Help him navigate various challenges, interact with diverse inhabitants, and unveil the mysteries of his dark history.

In THE SENTINEL, solve problems in your own way, using your unique strategy. Choose stealth to evade enemies, craft tools for defense, or distract them to create an opening.

Prepare for a struggle between modernity and primal chaos—your journey begins now!

GAMEPLAY ELEMENTS

THE SENTINEL is a single-player first-person immersive sim that blends survival horror and puzzle mechanics. As you venture deeper into the island, you'll need to complete various objectives to survive and ultimately escape. You have multiple options at your disposal, but you'll also face environmental challenges along the way.

  • Weapons and Tools: Craft tools using resources you gather from the environment. These tools and weapons will make survival easier and allow you to defend yourself. easier and allow you to defend yourself: electric mines, sound devices to distract enemies, torches, gas lamps and more.

  • Special Necklaces: Discover rare necklaces scattered throughout the island. Though difficult to find, wearing them grants you special abilities. However, you can still progress without them.

  • Go Stealth or Be Violent: Choose between stealth and aggression. You can move through shadows and dark areas unnoticed, or employ your strategy and risk being chased by Sentinels. Utilize parkour, solve puzzles, and use your crafted weapons to outmaneuver enemies.

  • Bosses, Enemy Soldiers and Civilians: Sentinel soldiers are on the lookout for you across the island! If they catch you, it’s game over. Additionally, you’ll encounter formidable bosses like Ceifador, who relentlessly pursue you. They are fast, powerful, and nearly unstoppable, so hiding or escaping is crucial. Civilians may seem harmless, but if they perceive you as a threat, they can alert the soldiers by screaming or reporting your location. Stay vigilant!

  • Traps: The island is littered with traps—some natural, others constructed by the Sentinels. Beware of sound traps that emit loud noises, as well as dangerous traps that can harm you. Always be aware of your surroundings.

  • And More: At Aquila Games, we are dedicated to making THE SENTINEL feel natural, immersive, and terrifying. There are countless secrets and experiences waiting to be explored!
